content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the ESL Languages website and find out which language courses interest the user. Your computer executed the command and returned a list of language courses offered by EF, with links to their main content, course finder, price request, and brochure. EF offers courses in 10 languages and 50 destinations, with options for language and academic studies abroad, as well as personalized language courses for adults and professionals.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Cactus Language offers over 20 languages taught in more than 120 locations all over the world. The languages offered include English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, and others. They offer general language courses for adults, professional courses for business purposes, language plus activity holidays, and summer language camps for children or teenagers. \n \n Links: [\'\\n    Accept\\n   (javascript:void(0);)\', "Don\'t ask me again (javascript:void(0);)", \' (https://www.facebook.com/cactuslanguagetraining)\', \' (https://twitter.com/cactuslanguage)\', \' (https://plus.google.com/+Cactuslanguage01/posts)\']'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.goabroad.com/articles/goabroad-top-travel-destinations-report-2018", "question": "What are some of the top travel destinations according to GoAbroad?"}}}'}]
"""
